title: Subpart 52-3 - General Technical Standards For Tissue Banks
content:
Subpart 52-3 - General Technical Standards For Tissue Banks

State Regulations
§ 52-3.1 - Compliance with fda regulations and manufacturers' instructions
§ 52-3.2 - Sterilization of instruments
§ 52-3.3 - Qualifications of donors
§ 52-3.4 - Selection and testing requirements for tissue donors
§ 52-3.5 - Quality assurance and safety requirements
§ 52-3.6 - Hiv antibody testing and notification
§ 52-3.7 - Reporting requirements
§ 52-3.8 - Special circumstances

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
